note: I was born the UK but moved to NZ as a child so identify as a Kiwi. Since 1989 I have lived in France and am now in Audierne on the Bretagne coast. Before retiring to Aufierne, I worked for 18 years for Public Services International, a France-based global federation of public sector trade unions. Before that I lived in New Zealand mainly working for unions and student bodies. My handle is @mikewaghorne@mstdn.socia
